title: Did i get lucky? Or?
body:
I seem to always get good rolls. Does everyone else?

https://gyazo.com/b264a07d789b7911089737e6c2370c59

replies.body: I hardly get key Frags so yeah. you are lucky.
get owned son i got red baron corki to bad i already upgraded it before i screen captured it

Well I'm a onetrick.
I only play GP, and you can't get a lot of chests when playing one champion only

What I do is I go into Normals with a Friend. 1 game I play my main and he play a champ with which he doesn't have a chest, and the next game we do the opposite. If you play Ranked more often than Normals, your Normals MMR should be much lower, so you should be able to get an S with your main quite easily.

I often get S-es on GP, but the amount of S-es you can get on one champ is limited, and I don't really want to play any other champion because GP is the reason I'm still enjoying this game as much as I do c:

Yeah, but if YOU get an S on GP, everyone on your premade is getting a chest for their current champion, if they don't already have one. So YOU can get the S, while your friend plays Yorick jungle for the first time, and he will get the chest for Yorick. Then HE can play his main while you try Illaoi (just for the lore with GP), and if he gets an S, you'll get a chest for Illaoi ;)

I have level 4 mastery on Illaoi. I bought her bundle when she was first released.
But people figured out you just had to walk away to counter her... So playing her was... Litterally masochism. I might play her again some time soon...
Illaoi was just an example x) You can get chest with champs no matter your mastery level, you just need to own them.

A IRL friend got Pulsefire Ezreal at the first chest opening. I insulted him for a good quarter of an hour, at least, when he told me

And some chests later he got Spirit Guard Udyr too, after he bought some more chest spending 5€ overall on chests

Meanwhile, in my first 4 chests opening i got like 1 ward skin, and 2 summoner icons

Sad
I just want my Dunkmaster Darius from those chests... {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
I guess but they're always on champs I find boring
O_o well man your luck is out of normal standard for sure .... but i'm happy with my SGUdyr too :P
